history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How? <break strength='strong'/>
USER walking
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you walking directions in mobility mode. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Allegheny County Courthouse
TTS Okay, going to allegheny county courthouse. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Pittsburgh Paints Arena
TTS Okay, leaving from ppg paints arena. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 05:47 pm.
TTS <speak>pause</speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok</speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the route in <break strength='weak'/>  Bind or Visually Impaired mode, to hear the routes in <break strength='weak'/>  Sighted and Walking mode, please say <break strength='weak'/> ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at PPG Paints Arena. Go west on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear right on ROSS STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER proceed
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear left on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the route in <break strength='weak'/>  Sighted and Walking mode, to hear the routes in <break strength='weak'/>  Bind or Visually Impaired mode, please say <break strength='weak'/> ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
